publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-759 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees a revision to the programme of business for Wednesday 7 January 2004, as agreed on 17 December 2003- after- 2.30pm Time for Reflection - Cardinal Keith O'Brien, Archbishop of St Andrews and Edinburgh followed by Parliamentary Bureau Motions insert- followed by Ministerial Statement on Fisheries Supported by: Tavish Scott*
